subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Police have charged Nickey Maxwell Van Exel, the 20-year-old son of the former N.B.A. player Nick Van Exel, with capital murder.
snippet: Police have charged Nickey Maxwell Van Exel, the 20-year-old son of the former N.B.A. player Nick Van Exel, with capital murder.
